event.title: November Talk Night
event.description:
Though we were originally talking BaaS we've decided to hold off until later to make sure we get some really excellent coverage. 

Instead we've got a more general talk night with the following awesome people:

Rich Turton - I'm an idiot. Maybe you're an idiot. This is a good thing.

Scott Alexander-Bown - Remote working FTW

Tizz Chapman - It's not me, it's you

Where?

Desklodge 4th floor, 1 Temple Way, BS2 0BY

When?

Please also note that we've changed that date AGAIN - Wednesday the 30th of November. 

Doors open at 6:30pm, first speaker will start at 7pm. 

At around 9pm we'll move on to a local pub for more conversations. 

The front door will close from 7pm, if you're arriving after this please contact one of the organisers and we'll send someone to let you in the back door!
